howToStart.title: How to Get Started?
steps: Open a YouTube or Bilibili video page
Click the extension icon in the browser toolbar to open the sidebar
Click the \"Start Recognition\" button (first time requires model download confirmation)

welcome.footer: You can view real-time transcription progress in the sidebar at any time.
